text: The Andreu government is the incumbent regional government of La Rioja led by President Concha Andreu. It was formed in August 2019 after the regional election. ==Government== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:left;" |- ! scope=col|Name ! scope=col
